titleStmt.title: The mournful maid of Berkshire: containing her woeful lamentation for her dearly beloved maiden-head, which she unfortunately lost upon the wheat-mow, with lusty Dick the dung-man. To the tune of, The jealous lover. Licens'd.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Attend you friends and parents dear ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
